meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a long roll filled with meats, cheeses, and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious hoagy for lunch today.
meanings.sent2: The hoagy from the deli was packed with tasty ingredients.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on my hoagy, but it still tasted good!
meanings.sent4: The hoagy was a tower of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The hoagy was so big, it barely fit in my hands.

meanings.definition: To eat or consume a hoagy sandwich.
meanings.sent1: I will hoagy this sandwich in no time.
meanings.sent2: She hoagied her lunch quickly before heading back to work.
meanings.sent3: He hoagied his hoagy so fast, it was gone in seconds!
meanings.sent4: I hoagy my sandwich like a champ.
meanings.sent5: The way she hoagied that hoagy was impressive.
